description: The saved .org file gets modified after opening them. And consumers need something that is just one click away. Every time after opening the app u need to load the saved file. Not good.
seriously useless at this point until they add some simple features like making repeated tasks in a week.

I use it for my Uni schedule and it works fine. The design is okay and I would appreciate it, if it would look more modern. 
So only 4 stars.

As a student I've been looking for an application to look for my classes.
and there is no rival! Apparently it's the one and only option available!
It'd be so nice to have a dark theme.
please add options to change the first day of the week and set the Weekend days.
summary: Does it's job! but could be the best with a few tweaks

description: The GUI really look bad and gaudy with little to offer in terms of functionality. I think it might be better suited for a mac-clone OS like elementary. I would recommend using some sort of a calendar software instead.
Una muy buena aplicación para organizar las clases del colegio o la universidad
